title: HELP
body:
So my lol launcher keeps stopping at 255 files scanned,
if i try close the program or minimise it my computer freezes
PLEASE HELP have tried uninstalling and repairing same thing happens

replies.body:
What do you mean by "stopping"? Do you mean that it slows down until it just seems like it's frozen, or do you mean that an error message comes up?

What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?
